text: HEK 293T cells were labeled with 2 mCi / ml 32P-orthophosphate ( Perkin Elmer ) in phosphate-free medium ( Invitrogen ) for 2 h . Cells were then left untreated or treated with TNF ( 50 ng / ml , R & D Systems ) for indicated periods .
Cell lysates were prepared and used for immunoprecipitations with RPS3 antibody .
